recipesJson.name: Lemon filling adv
recipesJson.author: McFly
recipesJson.description: Everybody has that recipe that they can make last minute and run out the door with. If you didnt know, I love lemon anything.  This is a simple, bare-bones lemon cream with just a touch of graham cracker as a textural accent. Medium bodied; S&V certified.

reviews.text: Tried as a snv - subbed w/ FA fresh cream and TFA GCC and it's delicious!
